title: 4 snaps of Thandeka Dawn King’s new man
text:
4 snaps of Thandeka Dawn King’s new man share this

Cape Town - Uzalo actress Thandeka Dawn King has found love in the arms of Mlungisi Duncan.

The pair have been sharing their loved-up snaps on social media – and fans are loving it.



Speaking to the Daily Sun, the actress confirmed that she was in love but was not ready to make a spectacle of her new relationship because they've not introduced each other to their families.

"For now, we're still enjoying our privacy and each other's company," she told the publication.

Mlungisi also refused to speak to the newspaper about his personal life, stating that he's media shy.

Even though the couple have not spoken to media about their relationship, it hasn't stopped them from posting pictures together on social media.

READ MORE: Dawn Thandeka King on being a Sangoma and entertainer

They have even reached the wearing matching outfits stage of their relationship. They recently attended Uzalo actress Baby Cele’s umembeso and both wore yellow.

The mother-of-five recently parted ways with her businessman husband Jabulani Msomi. When rumours emerged that the couple's marriage was on rocky ground, she told DRUM that they're doing fine and that she's not getting a divorce. Months later, she revealed that they had gone their separate ways.

READ MORE: Lockdown S4: MaZet is back - and she’s not going to be quiet

SEE PICTURES OF THANDEKA AND HER NEW MAN HERE:
description: The cat is out the bag and Thandeka is sharing pictures with her new man.
